mapper.select: select * from project order by proj_reg_date desc

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn, proj_id, proj_title, proj_reg_date, member_no, proj_apply_deadline, proj_start_date, proj_end_date, proj_estimate, PROJ_REQR_PERSON, PROJ_REQR_SKILL, PROJ_TYPE, PROJ_CAREER, PROJ_PM, PROJ_WORK_TYPE, PROJ_WORK_PLACE, PROJ_WORK_TIME, proj_work_equip, proj_walfare, proj_detail, PROJ_FINISH_DATE, apply_mem, proj_status, PROJ_UPDATE_DATE, PROJ_REPLYCNT, PROJ_TOTAL_DATE FROM (SELECT * FROM PROJECT ORDER BY lpad(proj_id, 10, '0') DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into project(proj_id, proj_title, proj_reg_date, member_no, proj_apply_deadline, proj_start_date, proj_end_date, proj_estimate, proj_reqr_person, proj_reqr_skill, proj_type, proj_career, proj_pm, proj_work_type, proj_work_place, proj_work_time, proj_work_equip, proj_walfare, proj_detail, proj_status, proj_total_date) values('project'|| seq_project.nextval, #{proj_title}, sysdate ,#{member_no}, TO_DATE(#{proj_apply_deadline}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), TO_DATE(#{proj_start_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), TO_DATE(#{proj_end_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{proj_estimate}, #{proj_reqr_person}, #{proj_reqr_skill}, #{proj_type}, #{proj_career}, #{proj_pm}, #{proj_work_type}, #{proj_work_place}|| ' ' || #{proj_work_place1} , #{proj_work_time}, #{proj_work_equip}, #{proj_walfare}, #{proj_detail}, 0, #{cal_date})
